name: Forlorn Manor
description:
Forlorn Manor

WALKTHROUGH by XChain
http://anamei.net/files/games/FORLORN%20MANOR%20WALKTHROUGH.doc

Story / Characters

Three college students spend their vacation visiting an abandoned mansion one received as a inheritance. The mansion has a bad history of being haunted, but ghosts aren't real, right?

Features

A custom ABS system that centers on gun-style combat and interactive use of the mouse to solve problems with skills and items that you collect as you go.

Character switching between the two characters that allows you to solve unique puzzles and fight challenging boss fights that will require as much clever thinking as twitch reactions.

A multitude of weapons like shotguns, crossbows, and various handguns.

Playtime of at least 1 to 1.5 hours if you know all the solutions, averaging between 2 to 4 hours of total playtime otherwise.
